Name: Legislative session
Description: A legislative session is a meeting or assembly of a legislative body for a given period of time, usually the period between two elections. This type has properties for the session's beginning and end dates, the legislature it is a session of, and the members of the legislature during the session. It can be used by other types that may refer to things that are tied to a specific session, such as committee membership.

Properties.Name: Legislature
Properties.Description: The legislature (or other governmental body) that this is a session of.
